docs.title: RegTAP Data Model
docs.text:
This is a VO-DML formulation of the data model described in the RegTAP Standard, and has been created to provide a machine-readable representation of that data model. The motivation for doing this is to be able to then create XSLT that will translate VOResource XML instances into RegTAP XML instances in a platform independent fashion, so that there is a standard implementation of these transformations described in the RegTAP standard.

The practical use of this code is that it can be used as part of the ingestion pipeline in a full searchable registry for transforming from an OAI-PMH response to the tables for a TAP interface on that registry.

docs.title: The Transformation
docs.text: The transformation from a VOResource XML instance to a RegTAP XML instance is done with this XSLT.

docs.title: The Java Implementation
docs.text: As well as containing the standard Java code of the model (as generated by the VO-DML tooling), the Java implementation also includes some utility classes to make running the transformation easier, as well as functionality to save those instances to a relational database.

docs.title: Schema
docs.text:
The schema for the model instance serializations can be found below

  • XML
  • JSON
  • TAP

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This is the main reference data model containing primitive types used in other data models.

docs.title: Overview diagram
docs.text:
The whole model is represented in a model diagram below

GVmapivoa data modelivoa:Unit <<primitive type>> Unit ivoa:string <<primitive type>> string ivoa:Unit->ivoa:stringivoa:anyURI <<primitive type>> anyURI ivoa:anyURI->ivoa:stringivoa:boolean <<primitive type>> boolean ivoa:complex <<primitive type>> complex ivoa:datetime <<primitive type>> datetime ivoa:integer <<primitive type>> integer ivoa:nonnegativeInteger <<primitive type>> nonnegativeInteger ivoa:rational <<primitive type>> rational ivoa:real <<primitive type>> real ivoa:IntegerQuantity <<datatype>> IntegerQuantity +value : ivoa:integer ivoa:Quantity <<datatype>> Quantity +unit : ivoa:Unit ivoa:IntegerQuantity->ivoa:Quantityivoa:RealQuantity <<datatype>> RealQuantity +value : ivoa:real ivoa:RealQuantity->ivoa:Quantity

docs.text: the RegTAP model

docs.title: Authors
docs.text: Paul Harrison

The whole model is represented in a model diagram below

+content_level : ivoa:string +res_description : ivoa:string +reference_url : ivoa:string +creator_seq : ivoa:string +content_type : ivoa:string +source_format : ivoa:string +source_value : ivoa:string +res_version : ivoa:string +region_of_regard : ivoa:real +waveband : ivoa:string +rights : ivoa:string +rights_uri : ivoa:string RegTAP:Role Role +role_name : ivoa:string +role_ivoid : ivoa:string +street_address : ivoa:string +email : ivoa:string +telephone : ivoa:string +logo : ivoa:string +base_role : ivoa:string RegTAP:Resource->RegTAP:Rolerole0..*RegTAP:Subject Subject +res_subject : ivoa:string RegTAP:Resource->RegTAP:Subjectsubject0..*RegTAP:Capability Capability +cap_index : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger +cap_type : ivoa:string +cap_description : ivoa:string +standard_id : ivoa:string RegTAP:Resource->RegTAP:Capabilitycapability0..*RegTAP:Schema Schema +schema_index : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger +schema_description : ivoa:string +schema_name : ivoa:string +schema_title : ivoa:string +schema_utype : ivoa:string RegTAP:Resource->RegTAP:Schemaschema0..*RegTAP:Table Table +schema_index : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger +table_description : ivoa:string +table_name : ivoa:string +table_index : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger +table_title : ivoa:string +table_type : ivoa:string +table_utype : ivoa:string +nrows : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger RegTAP:Resource->RegTAP:Tabletable0..*RegTAP:Column Column +table_index : ivoa:nonnegativeInteger +name : ivoa:string +ucd : ivoa:string +unit : ivoa:string +utype : ivoa:string +std : ivoa:integer docs.title: Imports
docs.text: • ivoa

docs.title: objectType AltIdentifier
docs.text:
An alternate identifier associated with this record

AltIdentifierivoa:string alt_identifier

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description alt_identifier ivoa:string An identifier for the resource or an entity related to the resource in URI form.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Capability
docs.text:
Pieces of behaviour of a resource

Capabilityivoa:nonnegativeInteger cap_indexivoa:string cap_typeivoa:string cap_descriptionivoa:string standard_id

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description cap_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger An arbitrary identifier of this capability within the resource. cap_type ivoa:string The type of capability covered here. If looking for endpoints implementing a certain standard, you should not use this column but rather match against standard_id. cap_description ivoa:string A human-readable description of what this capability provides as part of the over-all service. standard_id ivoa:string A URI for a standard this capability conforms to.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Column
docs.text: Columnivoa:nonnegativeInteger table_indexivoa:string nameivoa:string ucdivoa:string unitivoa:string utypeivoa:integer stdivoa:string datatypeivoa:string extended_schemaivoa:string extended_typeivoa:string arraysizeivoa:string delimivoa:string type_systemivoa:string flagivoa:string column_description

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description table_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger Index of the table this column belongs to. name ivoa:string The name of the column. ucd ivoa:string optional A unified content descriptor that describes the scientific content of the column. unit ivoa:string optional The unit associated with all values in the column. utype ivoa:string optional An identifier for a role in a data model that the data in this column represents. std ivoa:integer If 1, the meaning and use of this column is reserved and defined by a standard model. If 0, it represents a database-specific column that effectively extends beyond the standard. datatype ivoa:string optional The type of the data contained in the column. extended_schema ivoa:string optional An identifier for the schema that the value given by the extended attribute is drawn from. extended_type ivoa:string optional A custom type for the values this column contains. arraysize ivoa:string optional The shape of the array that constitutes the value, e.g., 4, , 4, 5x4, or 5x*, as specified by VOTable. delim ivoa:string optional The ivoa:string that is used to delimit elements of an array value when arraysize is not '1'. type_system ivoa:string optional The type system used, as a QName with a canonical prefix; this will ususally be one of vs:simpledatatype, vs:votabletype, and vs:taptype. flag ivoa:string optional Hash-separated keywords representing traits of the column. Recognized values include 'indexed', 'primary', and 'nullable'. column_description ivoa:string optional A free-text description of the column's contents.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Detail
docs.text:
XPath-value pairs for members of resource or capability and their derivations that are less used and/or from VOResource extensions

Detailivoa:nonnegativeInteger cap_indexivoa:string detail_xpathivoa:string detail_value

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description cap_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger optional The index of the parent capability; if NULL the xpath-value pair describes a member of the entire resource. detail_xpath ivoa:string The xpath of the data item. detail_value ivoa:string (Atomic) value of the member.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Interface
docs.text:
Information on access modes of a capability

Interfaceivoa:nonnegativeInteger cap_indexivoa:nonnegativeInteger intf_indexivoa:string intf_typeivoa:string intf_roleivoa:string std_versionivoa:string query_typeivoa:string result_typeivoa:string wsdl_urlivoa:string url_useivoa:string access_urlivoa:string mirror_urlivoa:integer authenticated_only

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description cap_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger The index of the parent capability. intf_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger An arbitrary identifier for the interfaces of a resource. intf_type ivoa:string The type of the interface (vr:webbrowser, vs:paramhttp, etc). intf_role ivoa:string An identifier for the role the interface plays in the particular capability. If the value is equal to 'std' or begins with 'std:', then the interface refers to a standard interface defined by the standard referred to by the capability's standardID attribute. std_version ivoa:string The version of a standard interface specification that this interface complies with. When the interface is provided in the context of a Capability element, then the standard being refered to is the one identified by the Capability's standardID element. query_type ivoa:string Hash-joined list of expected HTTP method (get or post) supported by the service. result_type ivoa:string The MIME type of a document returned in the HTTP response. wsdl_url ivoa:string optional The location of the WSDL that describes this Web Service. If NULL, the location can be assumed to be the accessURL with '?wsdl' appended. url_use ivoa:string A flag indicating whether this should be interpreted as a base URL ('base'), a full URL ('full'), or a URL to a directory that will produce a listing of files ('dir'). access_url ivoa:string The URL at which the interface is found. mirror_url ivoa:string Secondary access URLs of this interface, separated by hash characters. authenticated_only ivoa:integer A flag for whether an interface is available for anonymous use (=0) or only authenticated clients are served (=1).

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType InterfaceParam
docs.text:
Input parameters for services

InterfaceParamivoa:nonnegativeInteger intf_indexivoa:string nameivoa:string unitivoa:string ucdivoa:string utypeivoa:integer stdivoa:string datatypeivoa:string extended_schemaivoa:string extended_typeivoa:string arraysizeivoa:string delimivoa:string param_useivoa:string param_description

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description intf_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger The index of the interface this parameter belongs to. name ivoa:string The name of the parameter. unit ivoa:string optional The unit associated with all values in the parameter. ucd ivoa:string optional A unified content descriptor that describes the scientific content of the parameter. utype ivoa:string optional An identifier for a role in a data model that the data in this parameter represents. std ivoa:integer If 1, the meaning and use of this parameter is reserved and defined by a standard model. If 0, it represents a database-specific parameter that effectively extends beyond the standard. datatype ivoa:string optional The type of the data contained in the parameter. extended_schema ivoa:string optional An identifier for the schema that the value given by the extended attribute is drawn from. extended_type ivoa:string optional A custom type for the values this parameter contains. arraysize ivoa:string optional The shape of the array that constitutes the value, e.g., 4, , 4, 5x4, or 5x*, as specified by VOTable. delim ivoa:string optional The ivoa:string that is used to delimit elements of an array value when arraysize is not '1'. param_use ivoa:string optional An indication of whether this parameter is required to be provided for the application or service to work properly (one of required, optional, ignored, or NULL). param_description ivoa:string optional A free-text description of the parameter's contents.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Relationship
docs.text:
Relationships between resources (like mirroring, derivation, serving a data collection)

Relationshipivoa:string relationship_typeivoa:string related_idivoa:string related_name

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description relationship_type ivoa:string from http://www.ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/relationship_type The type of the relationship; these terms are drawn from a controlled vocabulary and are DataCite-compatible. related_id ivoa:string The IVOA identifier for the resource referred to. related_name ivoa:string The name of resource that this resource is related to.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType ResDate
docs.text:
A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource

ResDateivoa:datetime date_valueivoa:string value_role

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description date_value ivoa:datetime A date associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource. value_role ivoa:string A ivoa:string indicating what the date refers to, e.g., created, availability, updated. This value is generally drawn from a controlled vocabulary.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Resource
docs.text:
The resources (like services, data collections, organizations) present in this registry.

Resourceivoa:string ivoidivoa:string res_typeivoa:datetime createdivoa:string short_nameivoa:string res_titleivoa:datetime updatedivoa:string content_levelivoa:string res_descriptionivoa:string reference_urlivoa:string creator_seqivoa:string content_typeivoa:string source_formativoa:string source_valueivoa:string res_versionivoa:real region_of_regardivoa:string wavebandivoa:string rightsivoa:string rights_uriValidationAltIdentifierRoleSubjectResDateRelationshipSTCSpatialSTCTemporalSTCSpectralCapabilityInterfaceInterfaceParamSchemaTableColumnTAPTableDetailvalidation0..*altId0..*role0..*subject0..*date0..*relationship0..*spatialCoverage0..*temporalCoverage0..*spectralCoverage0..*capability0..*interface0..*param0..*schema0..*table0..*column0..*tapTables0..*detail0..*

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description ivoid  ivoa:string Unambiguous reference to the resource conforming to the IVOA standard for identifiers. res_type ivoa:string Resource type (something like vg:authority, vs:catalogservice, etc). created ivoa:datetime The UTC date and time this resource metadata description was created. short_name ivoa:string optional A short name or abbreviation given to something, for presentation in space-constrained fields (up to 16 characters). res_title ivoa:string The full name given to the resource. updated ivoa:datetime The UTC date this resource metadata description was last updated. content_level ivoa:string A hash-separated list of content levels specifying the intended audience. res_description ivoa:string An account of the nature of the resource. reference_url ivoa:string URL pointing to a human-readable document describing this resource. creator_seq ivoa:string optional The creator(s) of the resource in the order given by the resource record author, separated by semicolons. content_type ivoa:string optional A hash-separated list of natures or genres of the content of the resource. source_format ivoa:string optional The format of source_value. This, in particular, can be ``bibcode''. source_value ivoa:string optional A bibliographic reference from which the present resource is derived or extracted. res_version ivoa:string optional Label associated with creation or availability of a version of a resource. region_of_regard ivoa:real optional A single numeric value representing the angle, given in decimal degrees, by which a positional query against this resource should be ``blurred'' in order to get an appropriate match. waveband ivoa:string optional A hash-separated list of regions of the electro-magnetic spectrum that the resource's spectral coverage overlaps with. rights ivoa:string optional A statement of usage conditions (license, attribution, embargo, etc). rights_uri ivoa:string optional A URI identifying a license the data is made available under. validation Validation 0 or more validation level altId AltIdentifier 0 or more altIds role Role 0 or more roles subject Subject 0 or more subjects date ResDate 0 or more dates relationship Relationship 0 or more relationships spatialCoverage STCSpatial 0 or more STC spatial coverage temporalCoverage STCTemporal 0 or more STC Temporal spectralCoverage STCSpectral 0 or more STC Spectral capability Capability 0 or more capabilities interface Interface 0 or more interfaces param InterfaceParam 0 or more params schema Schema 0 or more schema table Table 0 or more tables column Column 0 or more columns tapTables TAPTable 0 or more TAP tables detail Detail 0 or more detail

docs.title: objectType Role
docs.text:
Entities (persons or organizations) operating on re- sources: creators, contacts, publishers, contributors.

Roleivoa:string role_nameivoa:string role_ivoidivoa:string street_addressivoa:string emailivoa:string telephoneivoa:string logoivoa:string base_role

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description role_name ivoa:string The ivoa:real-world name or title of a person or organization. role_ivoid ivoa:string An IVOA identifier of a person or organization. street_address ivoa:string optional A mailing address for a person or organization. email ivoa:string optional An email address the entity can be reached at. telephone ivoa:string optional A telephone number the entity can be reached at. logo ivoa:string optional URL pointing to a graphical logo, which may be used to help identify the entity. base_role ivoa:string The role played by this entity; this is one of contact, publisher, contributor, or creator.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType STCSpatial
docs.text:
The spatial coverage of resources

STCSpatialivoa:string coverageivoa:string ref_system_name

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description coverage ivoa:string A geometry representing the area a resource contains data for; this should be tight at least with a resolution of degrees. ref_system_name ivoa:string The reference frame coverage is written in. This is currently reserved and fixed to NULL. Clients should always add a constraint to NULL for this to avoid matching non-celestial resources later.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType STCSpectral
docs.text:
The spectral coverage of resources, given as one or more intervals.

STCSpectralivoa:real spectral_startivoa:real spectral_end

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description spectral_start ivoa:real Lower limit (in Joules) of messenger energy interval covered by the resource (for the solar system barycenter). spectral_end ivoa:real Upper limit (in Joules) of messenger energy interval covered by the resource (for the solar system barycenter).

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType STCTemporal
docs.text:
The temporal coverage of resources, given as one or more intervals.

STCTemporalivoa:real time_startivoa:real time_end

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description time_start ivoa:real Lower limit of a time interval covered by the resource in MJD. time_end ivoa:real Upper limit of a time interval covered by the resource in MJD.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Schema
docs.text:
Sets of tables related to resources

Schemaivoa:nonnegativeInteger schema_indexivoa:string schema_descriptionivoa:string schema_nameivoa:string schema_titleivoa:string schema_utype

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description schema_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger An arbitrary identifier for the res_schema rows belonging to a resource. schema_description ivoa:string optional A free text description of the tableset explaining in general how all of the tables are related. schema_name ivoa:string A name for the set of tables. schema_title ivoa:string optional A descriptive, human-interpretable name for the table set. schema_utype ivoa:string optional An identifier for a concept in a data model that the data in this schema as a whole represent.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Subject
docs.text:
Topics, object types, or other descriptive keywords about the resource.

Subjectivoa:string res_subject

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description res_subject ivoa:string Topics, object types, or other descriptive keywords about the resource.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType TAPTable
docs.text:
TAP-queriable tables.

TAPTableivoa:string svcidivoa:string table_nameivoa:string table_titleivoa:string table_descriptionivoa:string table_utype

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description svcid ivoa:string IVOA identifier of the TAP service making this table queriable. table_name ivoa:string The fully qualified name of the table. As per VODataService, this includes all catalog or schema prefixes needed to distinguish it in a query, and it comes with SQL delimiters where necessary. table_title ivoa:string A descriptive, human-interpretable name for the table. table_description ivoa:string A free-text description of the table's contents. table_utype ivoa:string An identifier for a concept in a data model that the data in this table as a whole represent.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Table
docs.text:
(Relational) tables that are part of schemata or resources.

Tableivoa:nonnegativeInteger schema_indexivoa:string table_descriptionivoa:string table_nameivoa:nonnegativeInteger table_indexivoa:string table_titleivoa:string table_typeivoa:string table_utypeivoa:nonnegativeInteger nrows

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description schema_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger optional Index of the schema this table belongs to, if it belongs to a schema (otherwise NULL). table_description ivoa:string optional A free-text description of the table's contents. table_name ivoa:string The fully qualified name of the table. As per VODataService, this includes all catalog or schema prefixes needed to distinguish it in a query, and it comes with SQL delimiters where necessary. table_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger An arbitrary identifier for the tables belonging to a resource. table_title ivoa:string optional A descriptive, human-interpretable name for the table. table_type ivoa:string optional A name for the role this table plays. Recognized values include 'output', indicating this table is output from a query; 'base_table', indicating a table whose records represent the main subjects of its schema; and 'view', indicating that the table represents a useful combination or subset of other tables. Other values are allowed. table_utype ivoa:string optional An identifier for a concept in a data model that the data in this table as a whole represent. nrows ivoa:nonnegativeInteger optional An estimate for the number of rows in the table.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: objectType Validation
docs.text:
Validation levels for resources and capabilities

Validationivoa:string validated_byivoa:integer val_levelivoa:nonnegativeInteger cap_index

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description validated_by ivoa:string The IVOA ID of the registry or organisation that assigned the validation level. val_level ivoa:integer A numeric grade describing the quality of the resource description, when applicable, to be used to indicate the confidence an end-user can put in the resource as part of a VO application or research study. cap_index ivoa:nonnegativeInteger optional If non-NULL, the validation only refers to the capability referenced here.

docs.title: Containment
docs.text: This is contained by Resource

docs.title: dataType IntegerQuantity
docs.text:
extends Quantity

An integer number with a unit. Examples of such units that can be used for attributes are bit/byte/kiloByte etc.

«dataType»IntegerQuantityivoa:integer value«dataType»Quantity

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description value integer The integer value of this IntegerQuantity.

docs.title: abstract dataType Quantity
docs.text:
Meant to represent the value of a numerical physical quantity. Can be mapped in VOTables to FIELDrefs and PARAM(ref)s, in which case the @unit attribute of those VOTable elements is assumed to be mapped to the attribute on the Quantity. Ths is only allowed for these predefined ivoa types.

«dataType»Quantityivoa:Unit unit«dataType»IntegerQuantity«dataType»RealQuantity

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description unit Unit optional The unit of this quantity.

docs.title: dataType RealQuantity
docs.text:
extends Quantity

A real value with a unit.

«dataType»RealQuantityivoa:real value«dataType»Quantity

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name type mult description value real The real value of this quantity

docs.title: primitiveType Unit
docs.text:
extends string

Must conform to definition of unit in VOUnit spec.

docs.title: primitiveType anyURI
docs.text:
extends string

Represents a URI in the same way as the datatype of the same nam in XML Schema is used.

docs.title: primitiveType boolean
docs.text: The standard boolean, having values true or false.

docs.title: primitiveType complex
docs.text: Represents a complex number, consisting of a real and imaginary component, both of which are reals. Note that in many contexts there is no native mapping for this type and it must be treated with a custom mapping.

docs.title: primitiveType datetime
docs.text: Represents a moment in time using a date+timestamp.

docs.title: primitiveType integer
docs.text: An integer number (from Z).

docs.title: primitiveType nonnegativeInteger
docs.text: An integer number from N, therefore greater than or equal to 0.

docs.title: primitiveType rational
docs.text: A rational number from Q, represented by two integers, a numerator and a denominator. A native mapping to a serialisation context does in general not exists.

docs.title: primitiveType real
docs.text: A real number (from R).

docs.title: primitiveType string
docs.text: A string, represented as an array of characters treated as a single, primitive value. Ala Java, a string can not be updated, that is any update leads to a different string. However in contrast to Java we assume that two strings that are identical in all their constitutent characters are the same. I.e. string has value type semantics.
